data.text:
The Selection Race. One of the largest events at the academy, 
where horsegirls display their abilities to prospective trainers.
data.processed:
<story>The Selection Race. One of the largest events at the academy, 
<story>where horsegirls display their abilities to prospective trainers.

data.text:
Among the many eager girls trying their hardest, one ran at 
tremendous pace, all the while carrying a relaxed expression.
data.processed:
<story>Among the many eager girls trying their hardest, one ran at 
<story>tremendous pace, all the while carrying a relaxed expression.

data.text: Let's kick it up a gear!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Let's kick it up a gear!

data.text: (Waaaaaaaah!)
data.name: Crowd
data.processed: <story>(Waaaaaaaah!)

data.text:
Ma- Maruzensky speeds up further! The gap between her and the 
rest grows larger! She's running her own race!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Ma- Maruzensky speeds up further! The gap between her and the 
<story>rest grows larger! She's running her own race!

data.text: Hah, hah, hah… Mmm, the wind feels so nice!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Hah, hah, hah… Mmm, the wind feels so nice!

data.text: T- This is…!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed: <story>T- This is…!

data.text: Her running form is strong, beautiful, faster than the wind—
data.processed: <story>Her running form is strong, beautiful, faster than the wind—

data.text: Faster… I can go faster!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Faster… I can go faster!!

data.text:
And above all, she was kicking the ground with more joy and 
comfort than anyone else on the course.
data.processed:
<story>And above all, she was kicking the ground with more joy and 
<story>comfort than anyone else on the course.

data.text:
And the race is over! Maruzensky takes first place! With an 
overwhelming run that left the others far behind!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And the race is over! Maruzensky takes first place! With an 
<story>overwhelming run that left the others far behind!

data.text: (Waaaahhhh…!!!)
data.name: Crowd
data.processed: <story>(Waaaahhhh…!!!)

data.text:
Pheew! Aah, that felt so good—♪ I'm 
almost sad to reach the finish.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Pheew! Aah, that felt so good—♪ I'm 
<story>almost sad to reach the finish.

data.text:
Maruzenskyyyy! I didn't expect anything 
less! You're amazing! You're awesome!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Maruzenskyyyy! I didn't expect anything 
<story>less! You're amazing! You're awesome!

data.text: I-I've never seen a time like this before…!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl B
data.processed: <story>I-I've never seen a time like this before…!

data.text: Oh my, you girls! Thanks for all your support!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh my, you girls! Thanks for all your support!!

data.text:
You inspire me! I want to be as fast as 
you! Please run with me again sometime!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>You inspire me! I want to be as fast as 
<story>you! Please run with me again sometime!

data.text:
Eheheh, sure thing! We could do it right after 
this if you like! I'm always up for a run♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Eheheh, sure thing! We could do it right after 
<story>this if you like! I'm always up for a run♪

data.text:
I-is she really saying that after winning by 
a mile…? This girl's something else…!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>I-is she really saying that after winning by 
<story>a mile…? This girl's something else…!

data.text:
This must be what they mean when they say she's running on a 
different engine. I'd sure love to have her…!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>This must be what they mean when they say she's running on a 
<story>different engine. I'd sure love to have her…!

data.text: Let's see… Oh?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Let's see… Oh?

data.text:
Maruzensky, you're the ace I've been looking for! 
Maruzensky, can I talk to you for a moment!
data.name: Trainers
data.processed:
<story>Maruzensky, you're the ace I've been looking for! 
<story>Maruzensky, can I talk to you for a moment!

data.text: Oh dear～…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh dear～…

data.text:
Naturally, after that Selection Race, she was quickly swarmed 
with trainers looking to contract her.
data.processed:
<story>Naturally, after that Selection Race, she was quickly swarmed 
<story>with trainers looking to contract her.

data.text: But—
data.processed: <story>But—

data.text:
Maruzensky, you can be an undefeated Triple 
Crown horsegirl! Come make it big with me!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Maruzensky, you can be an undefeated Triple 
<story>Crown horsegirl! Come make it big with me!

data.text:
Oh my, going big sounds nice and all but… I'm sorry. 
Thanks for your passionate invitation.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Oh my, going big sounds nice and all but… I'm sorry. 
<story>Thanks for your passionate invitation.

data.text:
You will be a legendary horsegirl one day! Let 
me help you make your mark on history!!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>You will be a legendary horsegirl one day! Let 
<story>me help you make your mark on history!!

data.text:
Ahahah, aren't you exaggerating a little? I don't think I'm 
capable of that much. Sorry♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Ahahah, aren't you exaggerating a little? I don't think I'm 
<story>capable of that much. Sorry♪

data.text:
No matter how many trainers approached her, 
she politely turned them all down.
data.processed:
<story>No matter how many trainers approached her, 
<story>she politely turned them all down.

data.text:
Maruzensky… She's constantly been approached 
by trainers long before the Selection Race. 
I wonder why she turns them all down…?
data.name: Junior Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Maruzensky… She's constantly been approached 
<story>by trainers long before the Selection Race. 
<story>I wonder why she turns them all down…?

data.text:
I'm sure she has her sights set way higher 
than even those trainers have!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure she has her sights set way higher 
<story>than even those trainers have!

data.text:
I- I see, of course…! I can't wait to 
see her find a trainer who suits her and take to the big stages…
data.name: Junior Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>I- I see, of course…! I can't wait to 
<story>see her find a trainer who suits her and take to the big stages…

data.text: In the end, Maruzensky did not sign with anyone that day.
data.processed: <story>In the end, Maruzensky did not sign with anyone that day.

data.text: —One evening a few days later.
data.processed: <story>—One evening a few days later.

data.text: Pheeew…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Pheeew…

data.text:
I happened to pass by the training course when I saw 
Maruzensky running, her hair swaying in the wind.
data.processed:
<story>I happened to pass by the training course when I saw 
<story>Maruzensky running, her hair swaying in the wind.

data.text: There's still time… Rightio, let's go another round♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>There's still time… Rightio, let's go another round♪

data.text: —Hup!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>—Hup!!

data.text: Ha, hah, ha… Heheh!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Ha, hah, ha… Heheh!

data.text:
The same feeling I felt during the Selection 
Race came over me again.
data.processed:
<story>The same feeling I felt during the Selection 
<story>Race came over me again.

data.text: How does she—
data.processed: <story>How does she—

data.text: Faster… faster…!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Faster… faster…!!

data.text: What a fun and comfortable looking way to run…!
data.processed: <story>What a fun and comfortable looking way to run…!

data.text: Hah, hahh… Pheeew～. That hits the spot♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Hah, hahh… Pheeew～. That hits the spot♪

data.text:
Oh, dearie me? If I remember, you're the trainer I saw at the 
Selection Race the other day… right?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Oh, dearie me? If I remember, you're the trainer I saw at the 
<story>Selection Race the other day… right?

data.text:
Oh, dearie me? If I have it well, you're the trainer I saw at the 
Selection Race the other day… right?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Oh, dearie me? If I have it well, you're the trainer I saw at the 
<story>Selection Race the other day… right?

data.text:
Did you come all this way to scout me? 
Heheh, aren't you a dedicated one.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Did you come all this way to scout me? 
<story>Heheh, aren't you a dedicated one.

data.text:
So, what will I have the pleasure of hearing from 
you? See any future glory in my running?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>So, what will I have the pleasure of hearing from 
<story>you? See any future glory in my running?

data.text:
So, what sort of conversation will you bless me with? Have you 
found future glory in my running?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>So, what sort of conversation will you bless me with? Have you 
<story>found future glory in my running?

data.text: …? Just?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text:
I was just watching you run, thinking 
how much fun you were having.
choices.processed:
<size=23>I was just watching you run, thinking 
how much fun you were having.</size>

data.processed: <story>…? Just?

data.text: Ehh? …That's all?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Ehh? …That's all?

data.text: Oh, my… Is that really all you wanted? Hmmm…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh, my… Is that really all you wanted? Hmmm…

data.text: Heheh! You're kind of a strange one, aren't you?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Heheh! You're kind of a strange one, aren't you?

data.text: Heheh! You're kind of a strange one, aren't you?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Heheh! You're kind of a strange one, aren't you?

data.text:
Well, I'm have fun running… 
If you have fun watching, be my guest?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Well, I'm have fun running… 
<story>If you have fun watching, be my guest?

data.text:
Well, I'm have fun running… 
If you like watching, be my guest?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Well, I'm have fun running… 
<story>If you like watching, be my guest?

data.text:
For a while after, I watched her run around, 
happily, at tremendous speed…
data.processed:
<story>For a while after, I watched her run around, 
<story>happily, at tremendous speed…
